# xpc_endpoint_t

**Type Alias**

A type that represents a connection in serialized form.

## Declaration

```swift
typealias xpc_endpoint_t = xpc_object_t
```

## Discussion

Unlike a connection, an endpoint is an inert object that doesn’t have any associated runtime activity. So, it is safe to pass an endpoint in a message. Upon receiving an endpoint, the recipient can use [doc://com.apple.xpc/documentation/XPC/xpc_connection_create_from_endpoint(_:)] to create as many distinct connections as necessary.

## Endpoints

- **xpc_endpoint_create(_:)**: Creates a new endpoint from a connection that is suitable for embedding into messages.
